page.title: 17Trade
page.content: The new estates of Repton have no shops. The only shops are those in the High Street. Newspapers and dairy products are delivered in Repton. Bells of Repton,a{grocery}and confectionery shop takes orders from pensioners and delivers to their doors. As there are no large shops in the village, most people go to Burton (or Derby) to visit the{supermarkets}to buy most of their food. There are a several local businesses; for example W.T. Ainscomb is a{painter and{decorator,}B Slater runs Repton Wood Crafts which make{furniture;} John.F.Hall is an{electrical {contractor}and C.Hudson is a{piano} {tuner.}The nearest{animal markets}are in Uttoxeter or Derby. Newton Solney has less shops but does have deliveries to the doors.
